A ParserSymbolTableError coming from that function happens when the code thinks 
it entered an infinite loop.  Currently that means, we looped 50 times.

Do you have this code available so I can try this?  or do I need to download it 
myself
up priority due to possibility of infinite loop

I have successfuly indexed the entire GCC project on both windows and solaris 
without getting this exception.  It is possible that some change in the last 
month fixed whatever was causing the exception.

Note that I did get an out of memory exception on Solaris after the indexing 
completed and during the building of the type cache (see defect 63980)
